H0.text: who proved that cells come from other cells. Rudolf Virchow

H1.text: who proved that cells come from other cells. Theodor Schwann

H2.text: who proved that cells come from other cells. Matthias Jakob Schleiden

H3.text: who proved that cells come from other cells. Robert Remak

A4.text: Remak showed that the origin of cells was the division of pre-existing cells.

A5.text: He published Remak's work as his own, causing a falling-out between the two.
